thread.title: Tronc Brings Jim Rich Back as Editor in Chief of New York Daily News

author: Lukas I. Alpert
title: Tronc Brings Jim Rich Back as Editor in Chief of New York Daily News

organizations.name: new york daily news the new york daily news

text:
The New York Daily News has brought former editor in chief Jim Rich back to the paper, as parent company Tronc Inc. seeks to stabilize its newsrooms in New York and Los Angeles amid workplace misconduct investigations at two of its largest newspapers.
The nearly century-old New York tabloid has been in disarray following the suspension of two top editors amid sexual harassment investigations and the sudden departure of its interim chief.
...
